file.name: oai-spec-talkVotes.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  description: API for managing votes on talks
  version: 1.0.0
  title: TalkVote API
  contact:
    email: pafmon@gmail.com
paths:
  /info:
    get:
      summary: A testing path
      operationId: apiInfo
      responses:
        '200':
          description: successful operation
      x-router-controller: General
  '/{talkId}/votes':
    post:
      summary: Register a new vote for a talk
      operationId: registerVote
      parameters:
        - name: talkId
          in: path
          description: Talk Id
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '400':
          description: Invalid vote
      x-router-controller: General
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: number
              minimum: 1
              maximum: 10
        description: Vote to be registered
        required: true
    delete:
      summary: Delete all votes of a talk
      operationId: deleteVotes
      parameters:
        - name: talkId
          in: path
          description: Talk Id
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: successful operation
      x-router-controller: General
  '/{talkId}/votes/results':
    get:
      summary: Obtain a the results of a talk vote
      operationId: getResults
      parameters:
        - name: talkId
          in: path
          description: Talk Id
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: successful operation
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/inline_response_200'
      x-router-controller: General
components:
  schemas:
    inline_response_200:
      properties:
        count:
          type: number
          example: 15
          description: Total count of votes
        average:
          type: number
          example: 8
          description: Average vote
